title: Extreme ping lag for no reason
body: So yeah, tried to troubleshoot and nothing suggested worked and submitted a lag also. Spikes every 3 seconds or so to around 100 or 300 (never really in between). This is only happening on league I have tested on other games and my internet was been fine (constant 30-40 ping on au servers)

replies.body: Yeah I've just started too get it the past 3 days. Never really had an issue before it gets to the point my character slides everywhere then after about 30 sec it goes back to normal

Happened to me for almost 20 minutes per game, on different days, twice last week.
I was afraid I would get Leaver Busted so I stayed in the game while every single interact-able element of the game except my champion's move command was lagging horrendously. 
Every dozen seconds my game would be updated, but would lag out again. It's like watching a stop motion, 10 seconds of each slide.
this shit has been happening to me for a month only time i can play is 9am-3pm and even  then i sometimes lag
